channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- BigFix Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- BigFix Platform

item.title: CVE-2019-4061|2024-08-04T19:26:27.954Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 could allow an attacker to query the relay remotely and gather information about the updates and fixlets deployed to the associated sites due to not enabling authenticated access. IBM X-Force ID: 156869.

item.title: CVE-2019-4011|2024-08-04T19:26:27.590Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155885.

item.title: CVE-2019-4058|2024-08-04T19:26:27.952Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.2 and 9.5 could allow a low-privilege user to manipulate the UI into exposing interface elements and information normally restricted to administrators. IBM X-Force ID: 156570.

item.title: CVE-2019-4013|2024-08-04T19:26:27.860Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: IBM BigFix Platform 9.5 could allow any authenticated user to upload any file to any location on the server with root privileges. This results in code execution on underlying system with root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 155887.
